newsitem.title: JAPAN: Toyota says minivan sales exceeded target.
newsitem.headline: Toyota says minivan sales exceeded target.

text.p: Toyota Motor Corp said on Monday that it had received 23,000 domestic orders for its new LiteAce Noah and TownAce Noah minivans in the 16 days after the vehicles went on sale.
Toyota launched the two models in Japan on October 23 with a total monthly sales target of 6,500 units.
Orders for these models may reach 30,000 in the first month of sales in view of the strong demand, a Toyota spokesman said.
Kazushi Iwatsuki, Toyota's director in charge of domestic vehicle sales, said when the two minivans were launched that that orders could initially reach 20,000 units per month.
